InversionSupported

(Inherited from ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource .)

Matrix

Fetches luminance data for the underlying bitmap. Values should be fetched using:

Code
int luminance = array[y * width + x] and 0xff
(Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.Matrix .)

RotateSupported

(Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.RotateSupported .)

ToString

(Inherited from ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource .)

crop

Returns a new object with cropped image data. Implementations may keep a reference to the original data rather than a copy. Only callable if CropSupported is true. (Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.crop .)

getRow

Fetches one row of luminance data from the underlying platform's bitmap. Values range from 0 (black) to 255 (white). Because Java does not have an unsigned byte type, callers will have to bitwise and with 0xff for each value. It is preferable for implementations of this method to only fetch this row rather than the whole image, since no 2D Readers may be installed and getMatrix() may never be called. (Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.getRow .)

invert

(Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.invert .)

rotateCounterClockwise

Returns a new object with rotated image data by 90 degrees counterclockwise. Only callable if RotateSupported is true. (Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.rotateCounterClockwise .)

rotateCounterClockwise45

Returns a new object with rotated image data by 45 degrees counterclockwise. Only callable if RotateSupported is true. (Overrides ZXing.LuminanceSource.TLuminanceSource.rotateCounterClockwise45 .)
